verses.verse: If <WG1437> With The <WG3588> Tongue <WG1100> <WG3588> Of Men <WG444> I Speak <WG2980> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Of Angels, <WG32> <WG26> But Love <WG1161> <WG3361> Have Not, <WG2192> I Have Become <WG1096> Brass <WG5475> Sounding <WG2278> Or <WG2228> A Cymbal <WG2950> Clanging. <WG214>

And <WG2532> If <WG1437> I Have <WG2192> Prophecy, <WG4394> And <WG2532> Know <WG1492> <WG3588> Mysteries <WG3466> All <WG3956> And <WG2532> All <WG3956> <WG3588> Knowledge, <WG1108> And <WG2532> If <WG1437> I Have <WG2192> All <WG3956> <WG3588> Faith, <WG4102> So As <WG5620> Mountains <WG3735> To Remove, <WG3179> <WG26> But Love <WG1161> <WG3361> Have Not, <WG2192> Nothing <WG3762> I Am. <WG1510>

And <WG2532> If <WG1437> I Give Away In Food <WG5595> All <WG3956> <WG3588> <WG5224> My Goods, <WG3450> And <WG2532> If <WG1437> I Deliver Up <WG3860> <WG3588> <WG4983> My Body <WG3450> That <WG2443> I May Be Burned, <WG2545> <WG26> But Love <WG1161> <WG3361> Have Not, <WG2192> Nothing <WG3762> I Am Profited. <WG5623>

<WG3588> Love <WG26> Has Patience, <WG3114> Is Kind; <WG5541> <WG3588> Love <WG26> <WG3756> Is Not Envious; <WG2206> <WG3588> Love <WG26> Not <WG3756> Is Vain Glorious, <WG4068> <WG3756> Is Not Puffed Up, <WG5448>

<WG3756> Acts Not Unseemly, <WG807> <WG3756> Seeks Not <WG2212> The Things <WG3588> Of Its Own, <WG1438> <WG3756> Is Not Quickly Provoked, <WG3947> <WG3756> Reckons Not <WG3049> <WG3588> Evil, <WG2556>
<WG3756> Rejoice Not <WG5463> At <WG1909> <WG3588> Unrighteousness, <WG93> <WG4796> But Rejoices With <WG1161> The <WG3588> Truth; <WG225>
All Things <WG3956> Covers, <WG4722> All Things <WG3956> Believes, <WG4100> All Things <WG3956> Hopes, <WG1679> All Things <WG3956> Endures. <WG5278>

<WG3588> Love <WG26> Never <WG3763> Fails; <WG1601> <WG1535> But Whether <WG1161> Prophecies, <WG4394> They Shall Be Done Away; <WG2673> Whether <WG1535> Tongues, <WG1100> They Shall Cease; <WG3973> Whether <WG1535> Knowledge <WG1108> It Shall Be Done Away. <WG2673>
<WG1537> <WG3313> For In Part <WG1063> We Know, <WG1097> And <WG2532> In <WG1537> Part <WG3313> We Prophesy; <WG4395>
<WG3752> But When <WG1161> May Come <WG2064> That Which <WG3588> Is Perfect, <WG5046> Then <WG5119> That <WG3588> In <WG1537> Part <WG3313> Shall Be Done Away. <WG2673>

When <WG3753> I Was <WG2252> An Infant, <WG3516> As <WG5613> An Infant <WG3516> I Spoke, <WG2980> As <WG5613> An Infant <WG3516> I Thought, <WG5426> As <WG5613> An Infant <WG3516> I Reasoned; <WG3049> <WG3753> But When <WG1161> I Became <WG1096> A Man, <WG435> I Did Away With <WG2673> The Things <WG3588> Of The <WG3588> Infant. <WG3516>

<WG991> For We See <WG1063> Not <WG737> ' Through <WG1223> <WG2072> A Glass <WG1722> Obscurely, <WG135> <WG5119> But Then <WG1161> Face <WG4383> To <WG4314> Face; <WG4383> Now <WG737> I Know <WG1097> In <WG1537> Part, <WG3313> <WG5119> But Then <WG1161> I Shall Know <WG1921> According As <WG2531> Also <WG2532> I Have Been Known. <WG1921>

<WG3570> And Now <WG1161> Abides <WG3306> Faith, <WG4102> Hope, <WG1680> Love; <WG26> <WG3588> <WG5140> These Three Things; <WG5023> <WG3187> But The Greater <WG1161> Of These Is <WG5130> <WG3588> Love. <WG26>
